entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 08:53 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
